ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
Praise be to Allah, Lord of the Worlds,
Master of the Day of Judgment,
Thee (alone) we worship; Thee (alone) we ask for help.

ayas.arabic: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ ٱلْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
ayas.translation: The path of those whom Thou hast favoured; Not the (path) of those who earn Thine anger nor of those who go astray.
ayas.transliteration: ṣirāṭal ladhīna an`amta `alayhim ghayril maghḍūbi `alayhim walaḍ ḍāllīn
